entry.title: Connect to WiFi on Arch Linux Installer (archiso)

div.p:
The commands needed to connect to a wireless network on the Arch Linux installer (archiso):
systemctl start iwd iwctl station list station wlan0 scan station wlan0 get-networks station wlan0...

media:group.media:title: Connect to WiFi on Arch Linux Installer (archiso)
media:group.media:description:
The commands needed to connect to a wireless network on the Arch Linux installer (archiso):
systemctl start iwd iwctl station list station wlan0 scan station wlan0 get-networks station wlan0...

entry.title: EWW Bar Popup Window/Widget | Hyprland | Arch Linux

div.p:
Have you wanted to expand the functionality of your EWW bar? Today I explain the basic concept of creating a popup window using EWW wacky widgets.
Audio Menu Video: https://youtu.be/-OGKUgHJVL4...

entry.title: Audio Devices Menu (EWW Widget) Hyprland | Arch Linux

Ever wanted a EWW audio devices menu? I just made one for everyone to use! This is how you can set up a audio device switcher menu inside of EWW as a widget.

entry.title: Fix Wallpaper Banding, Compression on Windows 11

div.p:
How to fix Windows 11 wallpaper compression with a simple registry edit. Reboot once and your wallpapers will look good again.
Link to 4K Windows 11 wallpaper: https://drive.google.com/drive/folde...
